EmailTemplate.description: Used on IEP Bank Account Setup OSCAR Process
EmailTemplate.name: IEP Setup SanityCheck Passed
EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!AMS_OSCAR__c.Name} – Document submission for IEP Account opening
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
The documents for registering your Account for EasyPay services have been correctly submitted and we will inform you as soon as the registration is completed. Don’t hesitate to contact the IATA Customer Service team for more information.
Thank you,
IATA Customer Service Portal
{!AMS_OSCAR__c.Emails_reference_Id__c}
